about_the_game:
Kapih is a classic run-'n'-gun shooter platformer, with action packed levels and boss battles. The visuals and music are inspired by the many lost in time art-styles of India. We follow the adventure of our protagonist Vaanar who is a common kid in a colorfully imagined ancient India. His cute friend Bindu can also join him on the campaign if she likes.

In a world of every increasing complexity in video games, we aspire to offer an experience with simple yet fun mechanics, tight controls, never before seen visual and musical treat, in a potently nostalgic package. With Kapih, we pay our homage, all the way from India, to our beloved retro classics. We retain the original but add modern elements, transformed and combined with Indian cultural sensibilities.
